risk: Deletes the entire filesystem. Catastrophic data loss.
saferAlternative: Use rm -rf with a specific, verified path. Consider using trash-cli instead.
Use the minimum permissions needed, e.g. chmod 755 for directories, chmod 644 for files.

risk: Executes arbitrary remote code without inspection. Supply-chain attack vector.
saferAlternative: Download the script first, review it, then execute: curl -o script.sh URL && less script.sh && bash script.sh
